hymn.title: Lord, today, keep my heart
hymn.category: Longings—For a Soft and Open Heart
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - Dm - | Dm - Dm7 - | G7 - C - | C - C/E - | F - - - | Dm - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: Lord, to -- day, keep my heart, Keep it all the day. While I'm young, keep my heart Soft, dear Lord, I pray; Lord, I would keep my heart through ev -- ery -- day Soft and o -- pen to You.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, today, keep my heart, Keep it all the day. While I'm young, keep my heart Soft, dear Lord, I pray; Lord, I would keep my heart through everyday Soft and open to You.
